file.name: books.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Bookstore API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /api
paths:
  /books:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: limit
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'A list of books'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Book'
        default:
          description: 'A unexpected server error occured'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnknownError'
    post:
      requestBody:
        description: 'Book to create'
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Book'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 'The book was successfully created'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Book'
        default:
          description: 'A unexpected server error occured'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnknownError'
  /books/{bookID}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: bookID
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'The requested book'
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Book'
        '404':
          description: 'The book was not found'
        default:
          description: 'A unexpected server error occured'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnknownError'
components:
  schemas:
    Book:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        pages:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - pages
    UnknownError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        code:
          type: integer
      required:
        - message
        - code

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /books/{bookID}: get: parameters: parse parameter "bookID": path parameters must be required
